#include<stdio.h>
int scan()
{
    int ch;
    int n=0;
    ch=getchar_unlocked();
    while(ch>'9'||ch<'0')
        ch=getchar_unlocked();
    while(ch>='0'&&ch<='9')
    {
        n=n*10+(ch-'0');
        ch=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return n;
}
int main()
{
    int t,n,b,i,sum,flag=0;
    t=scan();
    while(t--)
    {
        flag=0;
        sum=0;
        n=scan();
        b=scan();
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            sum+=i;
            if(sum==b)
            {
                flag=1;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(flag==1)
            sum=n*(n+1)/2-1;
        else
            sum=n*(n+1)/2;
        printf("%d\n",sum);
    }
    return 0;
}
